description.p: The world is built and run by machines, and the machines are run by you. You are the grease in the vast clockwork that keeps modern society functioning smoothly. Without you, society crumbles to dust. Or someone just hires your replacement. After all, you're just as replaceable as any piece of Equipment.

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: Tinker's Tools and one type of vehicle.
Equipment: A set of grease-stained common clothes, a set of tinker's tools and a credit stick with 1,000 credits

description.p: While you're pretty familiar with a variety of machinery and technologies, you specialise in a certain tradecraft. You may be a member of a union for your trade. You can select your specialty from the table below or roll to select it randomly
Mechanics are typically a level-headed bunch willing to get their hands dirty in order to get the job done. They are resourceful, inventive and capable of approaching problems from different angles

setters.set: Perception, Technology, common clothes, Tinker's Tools

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I see a problem and I immediately want to fix it.
People cant be trusted, not like machines can
I speak in a lot of jargon that most people dont understand
Like me, machines have a lot of 'character'
I speak slowly because there is no need to rush
A machine's design can always be improved, just like myself
Im proud of my work, so I can't help showing off
I don't mind getting a little dirty, or even a lot.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Scale. Always build it bigger, stronger, and more baddass. (Chaotic)
By the Books. Safety first isnt just a motto, its a way of life. (Lawful)
Cooperation. Together, we can build a better world for all. (Good)
Automation. The world would run more smoothly if machines ran everything. (Lawful)
Determination. Hard work and a can-do attitude will get you anywhere (Any)
Fail Forward. A catastrophe malfunction is just another opportunity to learn (Chaotic)

select.name: Bond
select.item: Someone sabotaged a machine I built and caused a disaster
A family member taiught me everything that I know, but they vanished without warning.
A machine I created magically gained sentience, and now is on a rampage. I must stop it.
I'm deep in debt and I wont breathe easy until I'm free of it.
A stole my greatest designs, and I cant risk anyone knowing.
People dont realise it yet, but they need my new invention to perfect their lives.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: A approach people and machines in the same way
When something doesnt work the way it should, I get mad
I refuse to accept that I may have made a mistake
I need to break things open to see how they work
I'm a perfectionist to the extreme
I refuse to let other people help me, whether I need it or not.

description.p: You always know where you can get access to a car garage, a machinist shop, a robotics lab, or other similar facilites. When you work on a mcahine or vehicle with other mechanics nearby, they will speculate about what's broken, tell you about the mistakes you're making, and assist you with the project. You always know where to find the parts needed for vehicle modifications, weapon accessories, and other equipment, no matter how obscure.

sheet.description: You always know where to find facilties, parts or qualified helpersfor whatever project you are working on.
